name: Accordion
description: A vertically stacked set of interactive headings that each reveal a section of content. Supports single or multiple panel expansion.

props.name: defaultOpenItems
props.description: Default value for the uncontrolled state of the panel

props.name: collapsible
props.description: Indicates if Accordion support multiple Panels closed at the same time

props.name: multiple
props.description: Indicates if Accordion support multiple Panels opened at the same time

props.name: navigation
props.description: Indicates if keyboard navigation is available and gives two options, linear or circular navigation (deprecated)

props.name: onToggle
props.description: Callback to be called when the opened items change

props.name: openItems
props.description: Controls the state of the panel

subComponents.name: AccordionItem
subComponents.description: A single item within an accordion

props.name: value
props.description: Required value that identifies this item inside an Accordion component

subComponents.name: AccordionHeader
subComponents.description: The header/trigger for an accordion item

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display in the header

props.name: expandIconPosition
props.description: The position of the expand icon slot in heading

props.name: inline
props.description: Indicates if the AccordionHeader should be rendered inline

props.name: size
props.description: Size of spacing in the heading

subComponents.name: AccordionPanel
subComponents.description: The collapsible content panel for an accordion item

props.name: children
props.description: The content to display in the panel
